posts.name: Johanw666
posts.cooked: On a related subject, is this forum compatible with Tapatalk? That works much better on a phone than a mobile website.

I used to use the Samsung browser on my phone (not sure if it‚Äôs available on non-Samsung phones), it has its own dark mode for all websites. It works better with some and worse with others, but the forum looks pretty good in black in it.
@riyapenn-signal, As a moderator, do you think you can help us with this? Or any moderator for that matter. I didn‚Äôt know how to ping the group as a whole.

low-key:

Or any moderator for that matter. I didn‚Äôt know how to ping the group as whole.

On any post you can press the flag icon ‚Üí Notify staff privately ‚Üí Something Else to request moderator attention.

Just to reiterate what I already told @low-key in private: I don‚Äôt know what needs to be done to add a dark mode to this forum. If there‚Äôs an option available to me somewhere, I haven‚Äôt found it yet

I found some documentation for it but looks like it will require some effort from the moderators to implement it.

Discourse Meta ‚Äì 12 Apr 17

Allow users to select dark or light theme

You can allow your users to select any themes. In this little post I will explain how to create a ‚Äúdark‚Äù theme and ‚Äúlight‚Äù theme and then allow users to select between them. Create a Dark color scheme Head to...

Reading time: 3 mins üïë Likes: 94 ‚ù§

Would it be too much to ask you to at least look into it? Would really appreciate it and I‚Äôm sure so would many others.
